heading: Today
text: Patches of fog through the river valleys early.  High clouds, mixed with limited sun south, and filtered sunshine north.  A few degrees cooler.  Highs in the 70s, close to 80 far north.  Light winds, except south 5 to 10 mph near Lake Champlain, becoming light.

heading: Tonight
text: Periods of high clouds.  Clouds thicker through southern areas, with some isolated showers near and south of the MA border.  Lows in the 50s, a few upper 40s far north.  Winds light and variable.

heading: Thursday
text: Morning clouds giving way to sun.  More afternoon clouds north, and possibly a shower in the St. Lawrence Valley late.  Highs upper 70s to low 80s.  Winds light, becoming southwest near 10 mph through northern areas.
